function.name: memory
function.description: Perform memory operations. The name must be 'memory' only.

command.description: The memory operation to perform: 'view', 'recall', 'create', 'update', or 'delete'.

query.description: Search query string used for recall command, id cannot be used here.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return for view and recall commands

memory_id.description: Memory ID(s) used for view, update and deletion operations. For view and deletion, provide multiple IDs as comma-separated string. For view, if there is no id provided, it will get recent memories.

new_str.description: New content string used for create and update commands
